articles.title: Have to be better for longer - Southee on winning Tests in Asia | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: New Zealand head into the second Test against Bangladesh after an underwhelming start to their Test Championship campaign
articles.content:
Tim Southee cited consistency as a problem in both departments © Getty
After an underwhelming start to their Test Championship campaign, a 150-run loss against Bangladesh in Sylhet, New Zealand capt… [+2904 chars]
